At 3rd level, while your Battle Commentary lasts, you may use your reaction and expend one {@classFeature Bardic Inspiration|Bard|PHB|1} die to remark on specific events that take place during combat, generating different effects depending on what you pronounce:
{@note The options are presented in alphabetical order.}

entries.optionalfeature: Ooh baby, that's a knockout!|TheAnnouncer
Straight into the mix!|TheAnnouncer
And BOOM goes the fireball!|TheAnnouncer
What a hit, ladies and gentleman!|TheAnnouncer
A bold move from our deadly foe!|TheAnnouncer
Phew, I got scared back there!|TheAnnouncer
And from the shadows, they STRIKE!|TheAnnouncer
Could this be part of a new strategy?|TheAnnouncer
This is gonna be one hell of a show!|TheAnnouncer
Couldn't hit a cow's backside with a lute!|TheAnnouncer
Now That's A Lotta Damage!|TheAnnouncer
There's no way that just happened!|TheAnnouncer
Woah, that came outta nowhere!|TheAnnouncer
It's like watching a carriage wreck!|TheAnnouncer
Ooh, that's gotta sting!|TheAnnouncer
Looks like it's a game of attrition tonight, folks!|TheAnnouncer
This team needs a miracle right now!|TheAnnouncer
Now that's what I call MAGIC!|TheAnnouncer
Make no mistake, this is in the bag!|TheAnnouncer
It's not over till the Fat Lady sings!|TheAnnouncer

entries: 每个评论选项在每场战斗中只能使用一次，而且受影响的生物必须能够听到你的声音，才能获得指定的效果。你不能对你无法看到的事件进行评论。
他欢快地咆哮着。刹那间，竞技场的心脏与他的心脏同步跳动，聚集在一起的群众的兴奋点被他胜利地攥在手心里。

虽然大多数吟游诗人的道路可能导致他们花数年时间来磨练他们的历史知识，或者也许研究刀法，但少数人选择用最基本的工具来完善他们的能力：（%0%）。这种独特的吟游诗人以他们的口才和描述快速发展的比赛事件的能力而闻名，他们用他们的措辞在血腥的竞技场上煽动群众，在他们的眼睛享受行动的同时，把现实情况的转述直接带到他们的耳朵里。播音员是智慧和魅力的大师，是现场的主宰，是狂热的点燃者，他们是任何体育场的生命线；甚至能够把最微小的巷子里的争吵变成一个时代的奇观。
姑娘们，先生们!
当你在3级采用这个吟游诗人学院时，你获得了对（%0%）和（%1%）技能的熟练度。
如果你已经精通这两个技能，你可以获得其中一个技能的专长（不与类似功能叠加）。此外，你还学会了{@spell Thaumaturgy}咒语，并可以将其作为奖励动作施用于自己。
让我们准备好轰轰烈烈地干一场吧!
三级时，每个战场都会成为你的体育场。

Whenever you roll for initiative, you can choose to commence your {@b Battle Commentary}, lasting for the next minute and covering a range of 60 feet. For the duration of this feature, whenever an allied creature within range scores a {@quickref critical hits|PHB|3|0|critical hit}, or a hostile creature rolls a 1 on a {@dice d20}, you boastfully announce the event, regaining one {@classFeature Bardic Inspiration|Bard|PHB|1} die. Your commentary ends if you are reduced to 0 hit points or made {@condition unconscious} by any means.
一旦你使用了这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个长时间的休息。从10级开始，你可以在每个短时或长时休息中使用它一次。
这场战斗就要爆发了!
6级时，你的精神会随着战斗的声音而升华。

items: 每当你做了一个重要的声明，你选择的盟友的数量等于你的熟练度加成，获得相当于{@dice 1d4}+你的魅力修改器的临时打击点数。他们必须能够听到你的声音才能获得这些命中率，这些命中率会在5个回合后消退。

While your Battle Commentary lasts, as a bonus action on your turn, you can expend 1 hit die to regain 1 {@classFeature Bardic Inspiration|Bard|PHB|1} die. This can be done a number of times per use of {@subclassFeature Welcome to the Show|Bard|PHB|Announcer|TheAnnouncer|3|TheAnnouncer} equal to your proficiency bonus, and only when you have no remaining uses of {@classFeature Bardic Inspiration|Bard|PHB|1} left.
当你受到（%0%）的影响时，你可以使用（%1%）的动作，范围为60英尺。被援助的生物必须能够听到你的声音，才能获得相应的好处。

entries: 这是你们都在等待的时刻!
在第14级，你的话语足以影响战争的进程。

items: 当你受到（%0%）的影响时，你的声音在300英尺以外都能听到，你可以在你的回合中采取（%1%）的行动作为额外行动。
在你的战斗评论持续期间，如果你采取{@action Help}的行动作为你的主要行动，范围内最多有3个你选择的盟友可以获得相应的好处。

entries: 即使是Xanathar也不会看到这种情况的发生。
这个原型的主要概念是围绕着，嗯，说话的行为展开的。说话在5e中是一个自由动作，所以为了符合我对这个子类的设想，我选择了让玩家在每次战斗中都可以使用所有的（%0%）评论选项。
然而，如果你觉得{@filter 20 different options|optionalfeatures|source=theannouncer|feature type=cmnt}在战斗中有点难以处理（你是对的），你可以在该功能的描述中加入以下片段。
{@b "You learn 5 commentary options at 3rd level, and an additional one at 6th, 9th, 12th, 15th and 18th level."}
当遵守这一可选的规则时，对每个评论选项的（%0%）限制不适用。

entries: 直到你下一回合开始，对他们的任何攻击都是以劣势进行的。

entries: 他们在下一个攻击卷、能力检查或蓄力投掷中获得优势，直到他们下一个回合结束。

optionalfeature.name: Could this be part of a new strategy?

prerequisite.other: An ally within range uses the {@action Ready} action.

entries: They have advantage on the next attack roll or ability check they make. If they roll a number equal to or lower than 10, they can roll your {@classFeature Bardic Inspiration|Bard|PHB|1} die and add it to the result.

optionalfeature.name: Couldn't hit a cow's backside with a lute!

prerequisite.other: A creature within range misses you or one of your allies with a melee attack.

entries: They take psychic damage equal to your {@classFeature Bardic Inspiration|Bard|PHB|1} die roll, and must subtract your Charisma modifier from their next attack roll.

optionalfeature.name: It's like watching a carriage wreck!

prerequisite.other: A creature within range rolls a 5 or lower on a {@dice d20}.

entries: They must roll your {@classFeature Bardic Inspiration|Bard|PHB|1} die and subtract it from the next ability check, attack roll, or saving throw they make.

optionalfeature.name: It's not over till the Fat Lady sings!

prerequisite.other: You are reduced to less than a third of your hit point maximum.

entries: You gain a number of temporary hit points equal to your {@classFeature Bardic Inspiration|Bard|PHB|1} die roll + your Charisma modifier + your proficiency bonus. These hit points fade after 5 rounds.

optionalfeature.name: Looks like it's a game of attrition tonight, folks!

prerequisite.other: A total of 8 rounds pass since the start of combat.

optionalfeature.name: Ooh baby, that's a knockout!

prerequisite.other: You or an ally within range reduces a creature to 0 hit points.

entries: The target restores a number of hit points equal to your {@classFeature Bardic Inspiration|Bard|PHB|1} die roll, and gains a bonus to their next attack roll equal to your Charisma modifier.

optionalfeature.name: Ooh, that's gotta sting!

entries: The next time they restore any amount of hit points, they gain a bonus to one of the healing rolls equal to your {@classFeature Bardic Inspiration|Bard|PHB|1} die roll + your Charisma modifier.

optionalfeature.name: Straight into the mix!

entries: It has disadvantage on the next attack roll, ability check or saving throw it makes until the end of its next turn. If it rolls a 15 or higher, it must roll your {@classFeature Bardic Inspiration|Bard|PHB|1} die and subtract it from the result.

optionalfeature.name: This is gonna be one hell of a show!

prerequisite.other: An ally within range {@action cast a spell|PHB|casts a spell} that targets friendly creatures.

entries: Until the end of their next turn, they gain a bonus to attack rolls equal to your {@classFeature Bardic Inspiration|Bard|PHB|1} die roll.
